en-US.summary: Alexa can give you hot information from Board Game Geek.
examplePhrases: Alexa tell board game geek to describe Root
Alexa ask board game geek for the top five hot boardgames
en-US.name: Board Game Geek
en-US.description: Alexa can now tell you about hot games from boardgamegeek.com. Board game geek is the internet's foremost authority on all things board games.
